"A.P.242/2/25/10:00": "You mean my injuries? Don't worry. A few scratches here and there won't do me in."
"How about you two? Not that you guys really have time for a medical check."
"Haha. I'm not the one who should be taking it easy."
"Xiera's so busy managing everything, she can't even stop to gossip."
"I don't know myself. Xiao just said to head over there."
"...But I sort of get it. He's looking for something."
"<%me>. Amduscia was where you met Xiao for the first time too."
"...Exactly. He wants us to see Ro Kamits, the Dragonkin elder. That's gotta be it."
"We'll figure something out there... Won't we, Xiao?"
